department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: tall thin jar with crane lid; fluted trim near top; raised vine (?) design and a disc projection on top half; row of robed figures at center; light green glaze
dimension: 35 x 8 in. (88.9 x 20.32 cm) (dimension estimated while on view)
medium: Ch'ing-pai ware, porcelaneous stoneware with molded and appliqué décor under a light blue glaze
title: Burial Jar for Wine Storage, one of a pair
